messages.subject: Nihonto Trader
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, just a note that the NihonTo Trader site is down at the moment, I don t know why as I have no way of contacting the Board Host but I will endeavour to
messages.messageBody:
Hi all, just a note that the NihonTo Trader site is down at the moment, I don't know why as I have no way of contacting the Board Host but I will endeavour to find out why and when they expect to have it back online.

Sorry for any inconvenience.

cheers

Rich T

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
